participant_1.background:

my mom died when i was six.
my favorite color is red orange.
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
i eat a lot of fish.

participant_2.background:
I am close to my family, and we enjoy spending time together.
i am eighteen years old.
I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.
I want to share my photography with the world.

content.text: Hi, how are you? I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
Doing good, thank you! I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Breakups can be tough. How are you feeling?
I'm doing okay, I'm just trying to take it one day at a time.
That's good, I'm glad you're taking care of yourself.
Thank you. I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures, and I'm trying to figure out how to share my photography with the world.
That's really cool! I love sci-fi space adventures too. What's your favorite book?
Oh, that's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I'd have to say Dune by Frank Herbert.
Dune is amazing! I love that book too.
It's so good! I'm also a big fan of the Ender's Game series by Orson Scott Card.
Oh, I love Ender's Game! I've read all of the books in the series.
I also love your photography! You have a really great eye for capturing the beauty of nature.
Thank you! I'm glad you like it.
I would love to see more of your photos. Do you have a website or an Instagram account?
Yes, I have an Instagram account. It's @mynameis_user2.
